mapper.select: SELECT id, workflow_id, user_id, status, input_params, output_result, error_message, started_at, completed_at, created_at FROM workflow_execution WHERE workflow_id = #{workflowId} ORDER BY created_at DESC
SELECT id, workflow_id, user_id, status, input_params, output_result, error_message, started_at, completed_at, created_at FROM workflow_execution WHERE user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY created_at DESC
SELECT id, workflow_id, user_id, status, input_params, output_result, error_message, started_at, completed_at, created_at FROM workflow_execution WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO workflow_execution (workflow_id, user_id, status, input_params, output_result, error_message, started_at, completed_at, created_at) VALUES (#{workflowId}, #{userId}, #{status}, #{inputParams}, #{outputResult}, #{errorMessage}, #{startedAt}, #{completedAt}, #{createdAt})
mapper.update: UPDATE workflow_execution SET status = #{status}, output_result = #{outputResult}, error_message = #{errorMessage}, started_at = #{startedAt}, completed_at = #{completedAt} WHERE id = #{id}
